channel.title: 317 Glitch Help!
channel.description: I just downloaded a 317 source and client and everything is running smoothly. I went to change my home to Yanille but I have a problem with the fencing in the town. Another problem is the Magic Guild doors will not let me through. When I click on them the tell me I'm not allowed inside even though I made myself owner. I did see something in one of the files say something about it being a quest, but I don't know. If anyone could help me fix this I would be more than willing to rep++!

item.title: 317 Glitch Help!
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

you could wear the id 6070 cape, or remove replace object lines.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Glitch Help!
item.dc:creator: @reyes2303 reyes2303
item.description:
@reyes2303 wrote:

This is what comes up for “You ain’t allowed in here!”

//QUEST_3 OBJECTS case 1600: if (objectY == 3087) { if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 6070) { sendMessage("You sneak into the mage guild..."); ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID - 1), -2); } else { sendMessage("Piss off! You ain't aloud in here!"); } } case 1601: if (objectY == 3088) { if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 6070) { sendMessage("You sneak into the mage guild..."); ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID - 1), -2); } else { sendMessage("You ain't aloud in here!"); } } //END OF QUEST_3 OBJECTS

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Glitch Help!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

That model is overwriting your other models probably, and search for

“You ain’t allowed in here!” in your source and show what comes up.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Glitch Help!
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

check the id for what is there(a door i think) and check if that is the correct id in your objects.java or objecshandler.java or any file that is named something with “object”

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Glitch Help!
item.dc:creator: @reyes2303 reyes2303
item.description:
@reyes2303 wrote:

I just downloaded a 317 source and client and everything is running smoothly. I went to change my home to Yanille but I have a problem with the fencing in the town. Another problem is the Magic Guild doors will not let me through. When I click on them the tell me I’m not allowed inside even though I made myself owner. I did see something in one of the files say something about it being a quest, but I don’t know. If anyone could help me fix this I would be more than willing to rep++!
